### Data  

```{r}
# import data
pop <- read.csv("OnlineNewsPopularity.csv")

# subset data on data channel of interest
pop.life <- pop %>%
  subset(data_channel_is_lifestyle == 1) %>% select(-starts_with("data_channel_is_"))
View(pop.life)
```
